price: Akasema (Nuhu) : Mwenyezi Mungu atakuleteeni akipenda, wala nyinyi siwenye kumshinda.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: Nuhu akasema: Mambo haya yamo mikononi mwa Mwenyezi Mungu pekee. Yeye ndiye atakuleteeni alitakalo kwa hikima yake. Wala nyinyi hamwezi kuikimbia adhabu yake itakapo kuja. Kwani Yeye, Subhanahu, haemewi na chochote katika ardhi wala katika mbingu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā yatīkum bihi al-lahu in shāa wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
